mapper.select: select p.name, p.id, c.lecture_num, p.name, c.changereason from changescoreinput c, person p
mapper.delete: delete changescoreinput c, person p where c.lecture_num=#{lecture_num} and p.id=#{id}
mapper.update: update scoreinputncheck c, person p set score=#{score} where p.id=#{id} and c.lecture_num=#{lecture_num}
